channel.title: [317]Only Allow Your Client To Connect To Your Server (Stop SYI & Cheat Clients)
channel.description:
[b]Description:[/b] Blocking cheat clients, and possibly spammers (Unless they download your client? :confused:) [b]Difficulty:[/b] 2/10 [b]Tested Server:[/b] DeltaScape & Project Insanity [b]Files/Classes Modified:[/b] Delta Server: Client | Delta Client: Signlink, Client | PI Server: RS2LoginProtocolDecoder | PI Client: Signlink, Client
[i]Note:[/i] I wouldn't suggest this tutorial to anyone who is currently running their server, as it will prevent everyone without the proper uid from logging in. (Meaning all your players will be blocked.) [i]Note:[/i] There are much better ways to stop people from spamming your server or using cheat clients, but this is a simple fix that will stop most people.
[b]Step One:[/b] Pick your base. [iurl=#delta]DeltaScape Base[/iurl] [iurl=#pi]Project Insanity[/iurl]
[anchor=delta][size=16pt][u][b]DeltaScape Base[/b][/u][/size] [b]Step Two:[/b] Client Side First things first, these methods probably already exist in your files, but some clients are different than others, so I'll just tell you the methods anyway and if you already have them just make the appropriate changes to them. Open signlink class and locate your run method Ex. [code=Java]public final void run() {[/code] [code=Java]public void run() {[/code]
Directly under that go ahead and add [code=Java]uid = #;[/code] That # should be replaced by a random assortment of numbers Ex. 984737582 [i]Note:[/i] If your run method already has uid = ... somewhere in it, just make the appropriate changes.
Save and close signlink and open client, find method84 [code=Java]public final void method84(String s, String s1, boolean flag) {[/code]
Im betting this is already in there, but look down and see if you can find [code=Java]aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method402(signlink.uid);[/code] [i]This writes out the uid when the client laods so that it can be read by the server later.[/i]
If not, add it under these [code=Java]aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method402(ai[0]); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method402(ai[1]); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method402(ai[2]); aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method402(ai[3]);[/code]
Save and close client.
[b]Step Three:[/b] Server Side Open Client and find these two lines [code=Java] clientSessionKey = inStream.readQWord(); serverSessionKey = inStream.readQWord();[/code]
Under that add this. [code=Java] int UID = inStream.readDWord(); if (UID != #) { disconnected = true; destruct(); }[/code] Make sure that that # is the same one you added into signlink. [i]This means that if the uid of the connecting client doesn't equal the #, the connection will be rejected.[/i] Save and close Client.
Congratulations, your finished.
[anchor=pi][size=16pt][u][b]Project Insanity Base[/b][/u][/size] [b]Step Two:[/b] Client Side First things first, these methods probably already exist in your files, but some clients are different than others, so I'll just tell you the methods anyway and if you already have them just make the appropriate changes to them. Open signlink class and find your run method Ex. [code=Java]public final void run() {[/code] [code=Java]public void run() {[/code]
Directly under that go ahead and add [code=Java]uid = #;[/code] That # should be replaced by a random assortment of numbers Ex. 984737582 [i]Note:[/i] If your run method already has uid = ... somewhere in it, just make the appropriate changes.
Save and close signlink and open client, find the login method. [code=Java]private void login(String s, String s1, boolean flag)[/code]
And if you look down a few lines, you should see this. [code=Java]stream.writeDWord(/*signlink.uid*/999999);[/code]
Which means its currently writing 999999 as the uid. Just replace it with this [code=Java]stream.writeDWord(signlink.uid);[/code] [i]This writes out the uid, rather than 999999, so that it can be read by the server later.[/i]
If you couldn't find it, add it right under this [code=Java]stream.writeDWord(ai[3]);[/code]
Save and close client.
[b]Step Three:[/b] Server Side Open RS2LoginProtocolDecoder (Packaged in server.net) and find these two lines [code=Java] long clientSessionKey = in.getLong(); long serverSessionKey = in.getLong();[/code]
Under that add this. [code=Java] int uid = in.getInt(); if(uid != #) { session.close(); return false; } [/code] Make sure that that # is the same one you added into signlink. [i]This means that if the uid of the connecting client doesn't equal the #, the connection will be rejected.[/i] Save and close Client.
Congratulations, your finished.
And that's the correct way to block cheat clients for Delta and PI, any questions, comments, or errors should be posted below. Sorry Fridder, but I'd rather people do it the right way rather than do it the wrong way.

item.title: [317]Only Allow Your Client To Connect To Your Server (Stop SYI & Cheat Clients)
item.dc:creator: @0nf1r3 0nf1r3
item.description:
@0nf1r3 wrote:

Halflingblade:

Okay, I know this is old but I came across a problem. When I use this guide, I follow everything perfect. When I go to login my username is 4 letters short, for example if I login using the name Havoc it logs me and as “c” and cuts the first 4 letters out. Its really wierd, this only happened after using this. Help please?

Did you fix it i got the same error???

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Only Allow Your Client To Connect To Your Server (Stop SYI & Cheat Clients)
item.dc:creator: @craig187 craig187
item.description:
@craig187 wrote:

jamespk:

this is not a tut on how to let ppl onto server its how to stop players getting on without client.

No this is a tut on how to add syi protection to your server to disable people multi loging and sy attacking your server. I want to turn this protection of because i want my friend to be able to join on same ip as me. I can’t find the bit of code in the server client because i am a noob these days. When i played rs p servers there was no syi protection. I have deleted this code in the past but there are several different versions of it. I just need you guys to tell me what the commen ones are i am using pkjadscape please help.

Read full topic

craig187:

Hi I need some help me and my friend are trying to connect. He can not connect to the server on the other computer and we need to know how to stop the multi-login protection. We are only hosting local on 127.0.0.1, not on the Internet.

this is not a tut on how to let ppl onto server its how to stop players getting on without client.

item.title: [317]Only Allow Your Client To Connect To Your Server (Stop SYI & Cheat Clients)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Diligo Deum, post:56, topic:348137”]For the noobs requesting how this works (no offense intended):

[ul][]client sends the designated UID during login
[]server reads the data and checks if the data matches the desired data (which the owner has set in the client)
[*]if it does not match the appropriate UID then the client’s login request is denied[/ul]

this is not the most secure way to do this but it’s about 99% effective towards noobs

the best security is the server keeping track of models roaming about the world and then checking on request of performing actions with a model[/quote]
What?

Read full topic
item.source: [317]Only Allow Your Client To Connect To Your Server (Stop SYI & Cheat Clients)

item.title: [317]Only Allow Your Client To Connect To Your Server (Stop SYI & Cheat Clients)
item.dc:creator: @Diligo_Deum Diligo Deum
item.description:
@Diligo_Deum wrote:

For the noobs requesting how this works (no offense intended):

[ul][]client sends the designated UID during login
[]server reads the data and checks if the data matches the desired data (which the owner has set in the client)
[*]if it does not match the appropriate UID then the client’s login request is denied[/ul]

this is not the most secure way to do this but it’s about 99% effective towards noobs

the best security is the server keeping track of models roaming about the world and then checking on request of performing actions with a model

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Although a small step twards doing this, a better implimentation is reading the client version (317, 508, 525, etc) and actually modifying this inside of your client as well. The client sends this to the server and most check for it, but don’t actually filter for it. Shall I write a tut on this later? Would just need to re-download a base, but this would be another step onto preventing from cheat clients.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Only Allow Your Client To Connect To Your Server (Stop SYI & Cheat Clients)
item.dc:creator: @usama299 usama299
item.description:
@usama299 wrote:

In server side, it tells me (After compiling)

./client.java:23425: cannot find symbol
                                    int UID = inStream.reaDWord();
   symbol: method reaDWord()
   loaction: class stream
1 error
Press any key to continue...

I need "reaDWord’ Method…

EDIT: It worked… its not “reaDWord”, it’s “readDWord”… For Delta
Worked perfectly, thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [317]Only Allow Your Client To Connect To Your Server (Stop SYI & Cheat Clients)
